ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] VIRUS WARNING
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh, it s a good idea not to use your computer when you know you are infected with a virus, at least it s a good idea to stay away from the net to avoid
ygData.messageBody:
Heh, it's a good idea not to use your computer when you know you are infected with a virus, at least it's a good idea to stay away from the net to avoid spreading the virus.
-----Original Message-----
From: Melanie Johnson [mailto:melanie_6602@...]
Sent: den 30 oktober 2002 16:23
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] VIRUS WARNING

Thanks for posting that link. Now maybe I can finally get rid of my Klez virus.

 Matthew Bond <mattgbond@...> wrote:

I was infected by a virus, which I have now cleaned from my system.
Please delete any messages from me that you recived within the last few
days, without opening them. I advise you to check your system for the
Klez or Bugbear viruses. You can download a free utility for cleaning
these viruses here:

http://vil.nai.com/vil/stinger/

Matt
